dct_description_sm: Relief is shown by spot heights. Map shows state, province, district, commune boundaries, power stations, electrical powerlines. "2-43." Military grid. Important streets and buildings are named. "Published by War Office, 1942." Reprinted 1943 by A.M.S. This is a map of the city of Padua, Italy, shown at a 1:10,000 scale. The map was created for use by War and Navy Department agencies during World War II.
dct_creator_sm: Great Britain. War Office. General Staff. Geographical Section
dct_publisher_sm: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1943.
